Get Started

 **Starting at $1 per optimized page***

# SO much more than an AI writing assistant

POP AI uses its best-in-class on-page optimization algorithm to create
beautifully optimized pages and content for Google, without you having to
write or optimize the content yourself.  
  
The POP AI Writer works with 62 languages.

Get Started ->

*when you bring your own GPT-4 key

 **james dooley,  
**jamesdooley.com

"As an SEO professional, I've always sought ways to expedite the optimization
process without compromising quality. POP AI is a game-changer! It takes
content that used to require hours of manual work and optimizes it within
minutes. The proprietary edge analysis algorithms ensure top-notch results.
With POP AI, I can confidently say my content is AI-optimized like a pro. It's
a must-have tool for anyone serious about SEO."

 **Brian Wray,  
**auq.io

"POP AI has allowed us to scale our content creation by 5-10x. The AI
processes works quickly, and it's easy to structure every brief. We've seen
faster organic growth from getting more pages live in a shorter amount of
time. The quality of the text is great, especially for affiliate and local
websites. We can create SEO content that sounds like a human writer with
minimal edits on our end.."

 **Ronald Osborne,  
**Osbornedm.com

"POP is my go-to on-page SEO tool. It always has been and always will be! POP
AI Writer has enabled us to dominate even more SERPs with its ease of use. I
stand behind Page Optimizer Pro and the amazing team because of the
exceptional results we have been able to achieve."

 **kasra dash,  
**fatrank.com

"I've been in the SEO game for years, and POP AI has been a game-changer. What
used to take me hours can now be done in minutes. Its edge analysis approach
is unparalleled, ensuring optimal results. I've witnessed substantial
improvements in page impressions, keyword rankings, and click-through rates
shortly after using POP AI. If you want to stay competitive in SEO, this tool
is a must-have."

## How it works

Let Kyle take you through the POP AI Writer. In the video below Kyle covers
why and how you should be doing on-page SEO, how to slash the time good on-
page SEO takes from hours to minutes, what are the most popular POP AI use
cases, how to get your POP Score from a 20 to a 100 with the click of a few
buttons.

 **MESSAGE FROM THE INVENTOR**

##  Kyle Roof

“AI tools will not get you all the way there. All AI content needs some level
of human editing. But POP AI Writer will get you most of the way there.  
  
The POP AI Writer is a dynamic marriage between POP’s powerful on page
optimization intelligence and the most advanced AI writing engine ever built,
GPT-4, all integrated for ease of use inside the familiar POP dashboard."

## Everything you  
need to get started

We’ve heavily invested in making the creation of SEO optimized content easy.
Here’s how it works:  

Step 1

Run PageOptimizer Pro on your target page to generate an optimization report.

Step 2

Open the POP AI Writer and follow the prompts to start creating a new page or
improve an existing page based on the report's recommendations.

Step 3

Customize and personalize rich content output with the many features and
prompts inside of the POP AI Writer.

Step 4

Adjust and re-generate the sections of the content you wish to change with
specific directions on how you want the content improved.

Step 5

When you’re happy with the final draft, refresh your POP Score and watch the
score jump from a low to a high score right before your eyes.

##  **Slash your AI content optimization costs**

Producing AI optimized content is usually fast, cheap and terrible quality;
fast, good quality and expensive; or slow, good quality and cheap. Wouldn’t it
be great if you could hit the trifecta, easy, top quality & cheap? Imagine
what that could do to the scale of your SEO campaigns?  
  
‍ **Well now with the POP AI, GPT-4 API key integration, this is a reality!  
  
‍**Produce limitless AI generated and optimized content using the POP AI for 1
POP Credit ($1) per article. Just connect your GPT-4 API key to your POP
account. Not only that, you’re going to be blown away by the quality of the
optimization and the speed.

Get Started ->

## A complete game changer for SEO’s and content teams.

The POP AI Writer slashes the time it takes to write and optimize content for
Google down to just minutes, without sacrificing quality.

### What makes POP AI Writer unique?

While the POP AI does create original content, first and foremost the POP AI
is a best-in-class content optimizing machine. It will generate SEO optimized
content better than any tool on the market.  
  
On top of this, it is also a powerful AI writing assistant with some unique
features to help produce top quality SEO content:

  * Page outline builder
  * Tone and voice customization
  * Rich content builder
  * Image placements and FAQ generator
  * Meta description generator
  * Intro & conclusion writer
  * Select your own competitors to prompt the AI
  * Auto insert info about your product or brand

### AI-enhanced content optimization

The AI content writer leverages advanced algorithms and natural language
processing techniques to rewrite and optimize your content, ensuring that it
includes all the essential keywords and phrases for better search engine
visibility.  
  
The result is well optimized content that appears more natural to Google and
humans and future proof’s you against algorithmic penalties.

## How you can use POP AI Writer

Generate new content

Optimize existing content

Combine the two

### Generate new content

Creating a brand new, original piece of optimized content used to be a job for
an entire SEO team involving content briefs, SEOs, writers with back and forth
reviewing, mark-ups and usually taking several days from start to finish.  
  
POP AI Writer can’t completely replace your SEO team, no AI tool can do that,
but it can reduce the process down to a single person and take a fraction of
the time it used to produce optimized content for Google.

### Optimize existing content

POP AI Writer intelligently inserts important words and phrases into your
existing content.  
  
Simply feed in your existing headings, sub-headings and paragraph content into
POP AI Writer to have it instantly scientifically optimized with  powerful on
page SEO data from the POP Content Brief. Take your existing content from a
low Optimization Score to 💯in a matter of minutes!

### Combine the two

Often you’re going to have existing content that you’re not quite happy with.
Or, you want more human involvement in the content you are writing and
optimizing.  
  
No problemo. With POP AI Writer you can custom combine the optimization and
re-writing of existing content with the recommendations and creation of new
content, without even having to regenerate the entire article!

WORKS ON ALL PLANS - **Starting at $1 per optimized page***

## POP AI Writer pricing

You must have an active POP plan to use the POP AI Writer. Plans include a
varying number of POP Credits each billing dependent on the plan.  
  
POP Credits are what powers the POP AI Writer. If you run out of POP Credits
before the end of your billing cycle you can purchase additional credits from
within your account in bundles. POP Credits do not expire.  
  
Check out our support article for a detailed POP AI Writer cost breakdown.  
‍  
*when you bring your own GPT-4 key

See POP plans

POP Credits bundles price

100

1000

$32.50

$60.00

$100.00

A bundle of 100 credits costs $100.00.

$450.00

A bundle of 500 credits costs $450.00.

$800.00

A bundle of 1000 credits costs $800.00.

## POP AI Writer pricing breakdown

NEW CONTENT

### Generate 1,000 words of new AI optimized content

4 credits

CUSTOM CONTENT

### Generate or regenerate optimized title section / H1

1 credit

CUSTOM CONTENT

### Generate or regenerate list of optimized sub- headings

1 credit

CUSTOM CONTENT

### Write or re-write an optimized paragraph text

1 credit

CUSTOM CONTENT

###  Bonus  
‍  
5 free re-generate uses per page  
Each piece of AI content includes 5 free re-generates. After that, each new
re-generate costs 1 POP Credit

## Get started with POP today

Works in any language & alphabet.  

Get Started ->Compare plans

### Advanced On Page SEO Made Simple.
